reviewText: The DVDs work well in my computer, but my Sony BluRay Player can't read the disks. Has something to do with the European formatting of the disks

I love this series. I gave this product five stars because the all the seasons included in the box work perfectly and are brand new. I have never ever had any issues with any dvds. This whole product is perfect from the hardware to the actually show included. The Mentalist has to be my number one favorite show.
I returned disc set as it was not for Region 1 viewing
